#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int find(string s) {
	int mx=-1;
	for(int i=0; i<int(s.length()); i++) mx=max(mx,int(s[i]-48));
	return mx+1;
}

int sum(string s, int b) {
	int ret=0;
	for(int i=0,j=s.length()-1; i<int(s.length()); i++,j--) ret += (s[i]-48)*pow(b,j);
	return ret;
}
		

int main() {
	int t; cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		string a,b; cin>>a>>b;
		cout << sum(a,find(a)) + sum(b,find(b)) << endl;
	}
}
